oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Steve Gibson and Mike Noble - 2017-03-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Musician spotlight program with Steve Gibson and Mike Noble from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 19. 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steve Gibson; Mike Noble;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (03:36) Announcements from Abigail St. Pierre / (04:51) Walk-in music / (09:10) Abigail St. Pierre with opening announcements and introduction of Steve Gibson and Mike Noble / (12:13) Opening comments from Steve Gibson / (16:59) Steve tells of his growing up in Peoria Illinois / (19:43) Song performance of Alabama Jubilee (guitar) / (21:19) Steve talks about advantages of working in a recording studio / (22:19) Mike and Steve talk about the music scene in Nashville in the 1970's when he started / (27:03) Steve tells Dave Loggins story / (29:06) Song performance of Please Come To Boston (guitar) / (33:33) Steve talks about making hit records / (34:56) Mike talks about Dave Loggins and touring / (36:58) Steve talks about Lynn Anderson and her influence on his career / (40:10) Steve talks about Glenn Sutton / (41:15) Steve talks about the Nashville "A" team /

(43:07) Steve tells story about working the last session in the Quonset Hut before Columbia closed it with John Anderson and recording the song Swingin' / (47:05) Steve tells Lynn Anderson story / (47:48) Steve tells George Strait story / (50:25) Steve tells Lee Greenwood story / (51:57) Excerpted performance of God Bless The USA (guitar) / (53:52) Steve answers question about the Nashville number system used in recording sessions / (57:50) Steve answers question about how to notate chord inversions using the number system / (59:38) Steve thanks the audience for attending and Mike Noble / (01:01:31) Song performance of Serenade To Summertime / (01:03:49) Closing comments by Steve Gibson / (01:03:59) Walk-out music / (01:05:23) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gibson, Steve (Guitarist); Noble, Mike (Guitarist); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
